dialogue.introduction: Of the two Fusou-class super-dreadnought battleships, I am the younger sister, Yamashiro. Umm, have you seen Fusou-onee-sama?
dialogue.library_intro: The second of the Fusou-class battleships, Yamashiro. A 'faulty battleship', or 'an unusual thing to be in the fleet'... Everyone said things like that... But that's okay, so long as I can fight alongside Fusou-neesama until the end...
dialogue.secretary1: I've been remodeled, so maybe, this will work...
dialogue.secretary2: The Admiral, too... Please take a break sometime.
dialogue.secretary3: Sister?! Oh, it's just the Admiral.
dialogue.secretaryidle: What...? Nee-sama & Yamashiro can't go to the seas...? What do you mean by that? This is utterly... unfortunate...
dialogue.secretarymarried: ....Admiral. Just like Nee-sama, I think the Admiral is a good person. I'm always grateful for everything... It's the truth, you know?
dialogue.wedding: T-thank you. But, my heart shall always be with Fusou-neesan's... Sorry.
dialogue.show_players_score: A letter... Maybe it's a letter of misfortune?
dialogue.equipment1: Is really okay to get this before onee-sama?
dialogue.equipment2: Modernization... They can't call me a 'faulty battleship' now...
dialogue.supply: I wonder if nee-sama has been properly resupplied...
dialogue.docking_moderate_damage: An unusual ship to be in the fleet... They sure do love to say rude things.
dialogue.docking_complete: The unlucky vessel is back again...
dialogue.ship_construction: Onee-sama? It looks like we made a new ship.
dialogue.start_a_sortie: Onee-sama... Yamashiro, will certainly be back here!
dialogue.battle_start: Enemy fleet sighted! Prepare for the battle!
dialogue.night_battle: Finally, a night battle...I have a bad feeling...
dialogue.mvp: Huh? I've swept the field...? No way, that's!? ... Really!? Onee-sama, did you see me!?
dialogue.minor_damaged1: Ouch! I knew it was bad luck...
dialogue.minor_damaged2: Am I hit!? Is the ammo storage on fire?
dialogue.moderately_damaged: No way, torpedoes? ...Remaining ships, please proceed! Annihilate the enemy~!
dialogue.sunk: Fusou Onee-sama... I'll be with you on the other side...
dialogue.second_anniversary_2015: Nee-sama, it's our second anniversary. The Fusou class sisters have been together for two years by now....Fufufu....Ufufufu
dialogue.rainy_season_2015: Nee-sama, the rainy season is such a nuisance since our outfits will rust! Really, I'm so… unfortunate.
dialogue.early_summer_2015: Nee-sama, a plan for a trip? I think it's wonderful! Yamashiro is fine with anywhere with you.
dialogue.midsummer_2015: Fusou nee-sama, I'm certain the weather is a little hot. I, got this bowl of shaved ice with red beans. From Mamiya's.
dialogue.fall_2015: Nee-sama...it's autumn, isn't it? It's okay. Yamashiro, will forever be at your side. I won't leave you.
dialogue.christmas_2015: Nee-sama, this turkey tastes incredible. Hm? That aircraft carrier is... That doesn't matter, does it?
dialogue.end_of_year_2015: Sister, I understand, cleaning is it. Haaa... So much dust in the turret... Such misfortune...
dialogue.new_year_2016: Nee-sama, please take care of me this year!... Ah, Admiral? Sure, take care.
dialogue.setsubun_2016: Dear sister. So I eat these beans and throw the rest, is it? And who is the demon right now... Ah, it's that child over there... Hehehehehe...
dialogue.valentines_day_2016: Nee-sama, Yamashiro will give you these chocolates, Admiral? Well I guess it can't be helped, here.
